column1: Anborn was a Rangers of Ithilien.

He was one of the Rangers in the company under Faramir who were on a mission to ambush the Men of Harad in Ithilien. He had been left behind as a scout near the Harad Road. Just before he returned to Henneth Annûn he saw Gollum lurking among the trees
column2: yet he mistook him for a wild beast. He did not shoot him because Faramir had commanded his men not to slay wild beasts for no purpose.
Anborn answered Faramirs question as to what was in the forbidden pool below Henneth Annûn
column3: saying that the creature was not a bird since it had four limbs and dove manwise.  He offered to shoot it with his bow
column4: at Faramirs command.  Faramir stayed his hand and when Gollum was captured had Anborn guard the creature.

column1: 2001-2007: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game:
: A Decipher card identifies one of the Rangers of Ithilien in The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers as Anborn.
Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
